thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Medical Properties Trust Reports Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share $0.37

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Medical Properties Trust Reports Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share $0.37
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Medical Properties Trust Inc:
* MEDICAL PROPERTIES TRUST, INC. REPORTS 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND ANNUAL RESULTS
* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 34 PERCENT TO $205 MILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.37 * QTRLY NORMALIZED FFO PER SHARE $0.37 * MEDICAL PROPERTIES TRUST - REAFFIRMS ESTIMATE OF 2018 NET INCOME TO A RANGE FROM $1.02 TO $1.06 PER DILUTED SHARE
* SEES 2018 NFFO TO A RANGE FROM $1.42 TO $1.46 PER DILUTED SHARE
* QTRLY ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.31 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
